__e: Save me from soiling myself from fear.
Come to me now, and save me from what threatens me!
Do me a favor, don't save my life anymore. My pleasure.
You saved me back then. So save me again now!
♪ Come set me free You've got the keys ♪
That's it, come on. Do it. Take your shot and save the world.
Save the chick your mom almost killed, before my guys finish the job.
Save the people from what I have done.
That's it, come on. Do it. Take your shot and save the world.
If you were smart, you'd save yourself and just forget about the others.
If you want to save somebody, save yourself.
"lf you want save somebody, save yourself."
I'm only saving you so I can kill you myself.
I save you, sometimes, from other people, but... not from yourself.
I'll save you, I'll get you out... your hands on your head!
Saving our hides, along with your sister's.
Why should we listen to you?
Well, you work on understanding them. I'll work on trying not to get us killed.
No, if you could only save one of us.
You must save her and bring her home, so she can share what she knows.
Listen to me. You got me out of a firefight; I can get you out of this.
Your father told me... that if I saved you my soul will be redeemed.
And maybe I'm not saving lives every day.
Are they gonna sue us? If I'm right, I save his life.
